peterPortal.title: Peter Portal
peterPortal.description: Worked on the backend for a web application aimed to help UCI students with course discovery.

portfolio.title: Terminal Site
portfolio.description: Created a terminal version of my portfolio that displays information using Unix commands.

allergize.title: Allergize
allergize.description: Developed a mobile app to check if a picture contains food allergies. Awarded Best AI Hack for HackUCI 2020.

stocks.title: Backtesting Stocks
stocks.description: Built a website that gauges the effectiveness of a trading strategy by testing it against decades worth of historical data.

pintos.title: Pintos
pintos.description: Implemented features such as Thread Synchronization and Priority Scheduling in a simple Operating System.

allocator.title: Memory Allocator
allocator.description: Created an explicit free list allocator in C with first-fit placement. Implemented low-level functions like malloc, free, and realloc.

shell.title: Simple Shell
shell.description: Developed a simple shell in C that supports Unix commands, piping, and redirection.
